title: Figure of Destiny
text: : Figure of Destiny becomes a Kithkin Spirit with base power and toughness 2/2.: If Figure of Destiny is a Spirit, it becomes a Kithkin Spirit Warrior with base power and toughness 4/4.: If Figure of Destiny is a Warrior, it becomes a Kithkin Spirit Warrior Avatar with base power and toughness 8/8, flying, and first strike.
